title: Two short but spectacular HS2 tunnels offer glimmer of hope for stalling project
description: Despite much soul-searching over UK’s inability to build infrastructure, two sections of HS2 under Chilterns are being hailed for their engineering
content: Seventy metres down, in deep incognito beneath a disguised ventilation shaft in the Chilterns countryside, lies HS2’s buried treasure: two 10-mile tunnels, built to avoid an area of outstanding natural beauty, eerily spectacular in gleaming concrete.... [6641 chars]

title: Celtic: 'I'm not sure I learned much more' about my squad, says Martin O'Neill
description: Celtic manager Martin O'Neill admits he did not learn much about his squad after a laborious Scottish Cup victory over sixth-tier Auchinleck Talbot.
content:
Celtic manager Martin O'Neill admitted he did not learn much about his squad after a laborious Scottish Cup victory over sixth-tier Auchinleck Talbot.
Only captain Callum McGregor kept his place from the team that edged out Falkirk on Wednesday, as O... [3509 chars]

title: After the Flood series two review - Sophie Rundle shines in the return of this dark detective drama
description: This crime drama’s lead is as luminous as ever in a show that’s a cut above the norm – even if it increasingly feels like it’s retreading old ground
content: Most crime dramas don’t even attempt to elevate themselves above their genre. Someone gets killed, suspects abound, the detectives pootle around for a bit, then the culprit is caught and everyone forgets about what they just watched. No harm in that.... [4325 chars]

title: High-speed train crash in southern Spain leaves 10 dead, police report
description: Two trains derail near Adamuz, Cordóba province, leaving scores injured, state-owned broadcaster reports
content:
Two high-speed trains have derailed in southern Spain, the rail network operator Iryo has said, with police saying 10 people have died.
Reports from the country’s state-owned broadcaster said that 100 people have been injured – 25 seriously.
The acci... [1144 chars]

title: More than 60 Labour MPs urge Starmer to ban social media for under-16s
description: The MPs says the UK "risks being left behind" if it does not adopt a ban similar to one in Australia.
content:
More than 60 Labour MPs have called on the prime minister to impose a ban on under-16s access to social media platforms.
In a open letter to Sir Keir Starmer on Sunday, the 61 MPs said "successive governments" had done "too little to protect young pe... [3525 chars]
